Computer tips & tricks

Admin

  • https://gandi.net nice registrar
  • https://transip.nl freebsd vps/cloud host from my country
  • Block .git directory access in lighttpd
  • use certbot to easily manage free ssl certificates

Free hosts/limited trial

  • Google cloud/app engine has free trial
  • Heroku has free trial
  • Vultr has 'free' trial but requires paypal AND credit card
